mmse.instruction: Please pass the phone to a caregiver or medical professional to conduct the MMSE test.
mmse.title: MMSE QUESTION

1.question: What is the year?Season?Date?Month?Day?
1.score: Each is for 1 mark, making this question for a total of 5 points.

2.question: Where are we now?Country?State?City/Town?Building/Hospital?Floor?
2.score: Each is for 1 mark, making this question for a total of 5 points.

3.question: Name 3 unrelated objects slowly and carefully, ask patient to repeat. Make sure the patients learn these objects.
3.score: One mark is allocated for each object they are able to repeat on first try

4.question: Spell the word 'WORLD' backwards.
4.score: 5 points one for each letter correct.

5.question: Ask them to repeat the three things asked earlier in this quiz"

6.question: Point out two simple objects such as a pencil, wristwatch etc and ask patient to name them.

7.question: Ask them to repeat the phrase "No ifs, ands, or buts"
7.score: One point for complete correct phrase

8.question: Instruct the patient: "Take a paper in your write hand, fold it in in half & put it on the floor"
8.score: 3 points: one for each part of the instructions

9.question: Give the patient a paper that says "Close your eyes". Instruct them "Please do what the paper says"

10.question: Ask them to construct a sentence about anything
10.score: 1 point if the sentence has a noun and verb

11.question: Draw any picture and ask them to copy

mmse.score_subtitle:
Total your score. 
Refer the table below to understand the results

about_us.content:
NeuroCare is an innovative app aiming to improve the quality of life of Alzheimer's patients using various forms of sensory stimulation to enhance memory and cognition. 

The app incorporates a variety of features in five main categories: identification games (auditory and visual stimuli), problem-solving games, daily tips for real-world interaction, knowledge-based learning, and meditation. 

NeuroCare aims to empower patients, helping them maintain their independence and improve their well-being and quality of life amidst challenging times.
about_us.title: About Us
about_us.subtitle: NeuroCare

meditate.3: Relax your shoulders and unclench your jaw.
